inauguraci√≥n de las obras - obra de la residencia art√≠stica #22cubic ESPACIO / OBJETO / CUERPO con:
Joana Moher (Portugal) _ESPACIO__ biotextil, visuales e intervenci√≥n sonora
Cristina Planas (Per√∫) _OBJETO__ escultura instalaci√≥n
Lisa Stertz (Alemania) _CUERPO__ performance en vivo

Dentro de cada concepto se propuso crear una obra por artista que tuviese relaci√≥n y se entremezclase con otras. Primero se realiz√≥ la residencia ESPACIO. Despu√©s, dentro de este espacio ya intervenido, la siguiente residencia cre√≥ el OBJETO. Con lo que result√≥ de ambas concluir√° la tercera residencia: el CUERPO. Las propuestas elaboradas durante la residencia tienen una uni√≥n entre s√≠ a resultas en una obra conjunta (com√∫n) desarrollada a partir de tres mundos - tres artistas - tres creaciones. 22cubic ESPACIO / OBJETO / CUERPO concibe la interrelaci√≥n como vital motor creativo y promueve la herencia de propuestas (sensibilidades) a trav√©s de los procesos de investigaci√≥n.

eng_________________________
opening exhibiton -- artworks of the artistic residency #22cubic SPACE / OBJECT / BODY with:
Joana Moher (Portugal) _SPACE__ biotextile, visuals and sound intervention
Cristina Planas (Peru) _OBJECT__ sculpture installation
Lisa Stertz (Germany) _BODY__ live performance

From each concept (SPACE /OBJECT /BODY), the artist created an individual work that was related and intertwined to the others. The first residency worked with the concept of SPACE. Afterwards, within this created spatiality, the next residency produced the OBJECT. The third residency will conclude with the research of the BODY, in the space and with the object/s resultant of the previous investigations. The proposals developed during the residency have a union with each other that results in a joint (common) work developed from three worlds ‚Äì three artists ‚Äì three creations. 22cubic SPACE / OBJECT/ BODY conceives the interrelation as a vital creative motor and promotes the legacy of proposals (sensitivities) through the research processes.

Saturday 26 May, 2018
doors open 20: 30H
free entrance

EVENT NAME: Gwenaelle Simon / FEMME SUR LE FIL
EVENT DESCRIPTION:
FEMMES SUR LE FIL

De fil en aiguille, la femme se livre dans tous ses √©tats. Passionn√©e, r√™veuse, d√©chir√©e, romantique, fuyante, perdue‚Ä¶. Le travail de Gw√©na√´lle Simon s‚Äôarticule autour de la figure f√©minine, qu‚Äôelle c√©l√®bre dans un cadre onirique et po√©tique.
En transformant ses images avec des fils ou en les d√©coupant et collant, Gw√©na√´lle Simon souhaite donner une nouvelle dimension √† ces h√©ro√Ønes de papier glac√©. Dans un monde satur√© d‚Äôimages num√©riques √©ph√©m√®res, il est √©galement question de faire na√Ætre et vivre des photographies √† l‚Äôaide de techniques d‚Äôun autre temps.

- ENGLISH -

Passionate, dreamer, torn, romantic, abandoned, escaping, lost‚Ä¶ Gw√©na√´lle Simon‚Äôs work is focused on the feminine figure that she wants to celebrate in a dream world and poetic context. With thread and needle but also with collage, she tries to give life to these glossy paper heroines. In a digital and screen saturated environment, her aim is also to make these photographs survive by renewing with ancestral embroidery traditions.

Welcome to discover this artist in our cosy shop with a good vibes and a free drink include.

Leos es un artista checo que esta haciendo una mini-residencia artistica en Hangar junto a Befaco.

LA FINCA

is a conscious movement and a creative hub of music, art, healthy food and community. As we are living through times of shifts and changes we are happy to announce to you a brand new concept in the city of Barcelona. We are creating a platform for free expression and creativity. For the first time in the city, there will be a community of dreamers, artists, doers and influencers. A day and night full of love, magic and self-expression. We will teleport you on a journey that will feed and nourish your soul and all your senses.
